Title: Pants on Fire
Writer: Andrew James, Robia Rashid (created by), D.J. Ryan (staff writer), Bob Smiley (consulting producer)
Actors: Keir Gilchrist, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Brigette Lundy-Paine, Michael Rapaport
Plot: Zahid teaches Sam to lie, while Elsa practices being honest. Evan helps Casey get over an embarrassment. A doctor visit forces Julia out of denial.
